A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There is so much potential or you can say expectation that there is a high possibility for disappointed. I feel that JJ Abrams should have made the movie so I have some “hope” hearing that he is doing the next one. There are some nice scenes and there are scenes that make you scratch your head. The force is becoming to easy attainable without training. Some things are not even believable. Too many will this person die. Mark Hamil is awesome as an actor but I feel he could have better material. It’s basically written for children. Some stuff is just so cringe worthy. Especially the inappropriate humor that was just awkward. It’s 2.5 hours but actually they needed to edit out 30 min of rubbish
